title: [In Game] Oktoberfest Gragas has no music during his recall animation on Howling Abyss
body: With the new ability to use recall animation on Howling Abyss Oktoberfest Gragas only does the dance but the music does not play.

replies.body:
Hey VincentBlack43,

Thanks for the report! We'll see where this dude's audio went and get it playing again. ^-^
